title: Shen skin idea " Air Craft Marshal Shen"
body:
As the skin would suggest  a skin for Shen based around be an air force marshal.

I'm not to sure what could be added  for effects but it could just be a cheap  975 skin.

What I imagine for his outfit would be  Shen wearing  a neon safety jacket  with black glasses and a hardhat with a black face cover and black pants.

and perhaps he could have a recall where he's calling in a plane and have incoming plane sound effects

replies.body: pretty similar to his skt skin
It's actually his TPA Skin but I see your point and that was my first thoughts when I saw the post "This looks like the skin he already has".
